p: The EU‐FORA programme supported by the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) offers an opportunity to professionals within the European Union (EU) to increase their knowledge and experience in food safety risk assessment (Bronzwaer et al., 2016). The aim of the programme is to contribute to the expansion of the EU ’s community of scientists working in the field of risk assessment and thus to increase both the pool of experts and to support cooperation with respect to food safety risk assessment activities at both the national and EU levels (Bronzwaer et al., 2016).
